# Custom GUI and dummy character initialization events
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE DIRECTLY, MAKE YOUR OWN COPY INSTEAD
namespace = CustomOnCheckGUI
# CustomOnCheckGUI.3 only trigger by daily check ui on_action
CustomOnCheckGUI.3 = {
	type = character_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	title = "Custom GUI"
	desc = "Loading Custom GUI, please wait... If this window isn't closing due to a bug, you can manually initialize any missing GUIs by clicking the corresponding buttons below."
	widget = {
		gui = "custom_gui_start_widget"
		container = "custom_widgets_container"
	}
	option = {
		name = "Did something break?"
	}
}
